properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 11:01AM CST until January 17 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Louisiana...

Bogue Chitto River Near Bush affecting St. Tammany Parish

The Flood Warning continues for
The Bogue Chitto River Near Bush.
* Until Friday January 17.
* At 10:15 AM Wednesday the stage was 10.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday January 15 and
continue to rise to near 11.5 feet by Thursday January 16.the river
will fall below flood stage by Friday January 17.
* Impact...At 11.0 feet...The access road upstream of the bridge will
flood. The river will leave the main channel on the left bank below
the bridge flooding woodlands on either side of Louisiana Highway
21.
properties.instruction:
Forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has occurred along with
anticipated rain for the next 24 hours. Adjustments to the forecasts
will be made if additional heavy rainfall occurs.

Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Remember, two feet of
rushing water can carry away most vehicles including pickups.  Turn
around and don't drown!

A followup product will be issued later. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio, local tv and radio stations...or your cable provider, for the
latest information. The latest graphical hydrologic information can
also be found at Weather.Gov.
